author: yperbasis
content: There'll be no 0-value withdrawals, will there? Can we enshrine that in EIP-4895? (So that we don't have to worry about EIP-161 removal of empty accounts kicking in or not.)

author: .paulharris
content: there will be no 0 value withdrawals

author: .paulharris
content:
In an unlikely case like a mass leak, it's possible that you may get an empty list of withdrawals, but you'll not get any individual withdrawal with amount == 0, hopefully that answers as completely as possible for you <@583892532644151312> 
CL literally skips past any that don't have a balance to transfer, so that we can be more efficient in filling the space.

author: djrtwo
content:
correct there will be no zero value withdrawals.

I have nothing against enshrining that in 4895 if it reduces complexity
